elements.name: Successful API Call and Valid Price Returned

steps.name: the exchange rates API endpoint is available
I request the latest USD exchange rates
the response should contain a valid price for "EUR"

elements.name: Various Status Codes and Status Field Returned by API

steps.name: I check the status codes and status field from the API
the API should return one of the expected status codes
the API should return a status indicating success or failure

elements.name: Verification of API Response time is not less than 3 seconds

steps.name: I make a request to the API

elements.name: Validation of USD to AED Exchange Rate Range

steps.name: I fetch the USD to AED exchange rate
the USD to AED exchange rate should be in the range of 3.6 to 3.7
I make a request to the API
the API should return 162 currency pairs
